Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 13 Piṭṭhiduka » 13.4 Bhāvanāyapahātabbahetukaduka
13.4.1 Paṭiccādivāra
Piṭṭhiduka
Bhāvanāyapahātabbahetukaduka
Paṭiccādivāra
93.
4266Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhe…pe… .
<< 13.4 Bhāvanāyapahātabbahetukadukaup13.4.2--6 Sahajāta-paccaya-nissaya-saṃsaṭṭha-sampayuttavāra >>
